en.title: Global AI Chipset Market, 2025-2030
en.summary: The global AI chipset market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 35% from 2025 to 2030.
en.bodyHtml: The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global AI chipset market for 2025-2030. To calculate the market size, the report considers the revenue generated from the sales of AI chipsets.

fr.title: Marché mondial des puces d’IA, 2025-2030
fr.summary: Le marché mondial des puces d’IA devrait croître à un TCAC de 35 % de 2025 à 2030.
